com.fortify.util.spring

Class SpringContextUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.util.spring.SpringContextUtil

  • public final class SpringContextUtil
extends Object
    This class provides utility methods for working with Spring ApplicationContext instances, like reading ApplicationContext data from XML configuration files and managing related PropertyEditor instances.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseContext

        public static final org.springframework.context.support.GenericApplicationContext getBaseContext()
        Get a basic Spring GenericApplicationContext with additional custom editors registered. The additional custom editors are automatically loaded from com.fortify.util.spring.propertyeditor (sub-)packages if they have the Component annotation.
        Returns:
        Basic Spring ApplicationContext with custom editors registered.

      • addConfigurationFromXmlResources

        public static final void addConfigurationFromXmlResources(org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistry context,
                                                          boolean errorOnMissingResource,
                                                          String... resourceNames)
        Add XML-based configuration from the given resource names to the given context. See DefaultResourceLoader for a description on how to format the resource names. After all resources have been added to the context, the context may need to be refreshed in order to process all bean definitions.
        Parameters:
        context -
        resourceNames -

      • addConfigurationFromXmlFiles

        public static final void addConfigurationFromXmlFiles(org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistry context,
                                                      boolean errorOnMissingResource,
                                                      String... fileNames)
        Add XML-based configuration from the given file names to the given context. After all files have been added to the context, the context may need to be refreshed in order to process all bean definitions.
        Parameters:
        context -
        fileNames -

      • addConfigurationFromXmlResource

        public static void addConfigurationFromXmlResource(org.springframework.beans.factory.support.BeanDefinitionRegistry context,
                                                   org.springframework.core.io.Resource resource,
                                                   boolean errorOnMissingResource)

      • loadApplicationContextFromResources

        public static final org.springframework.context.support.GenericApplicationContext loadApplicationContextFromResources(boolean errorOnMissingResource,
                                                                                                                      String... resourceNames)

        Load a Spring GenericApplicationContext from the given resource names. See DefaultResourceLoader for a description on how to format the resource names.

        This method will refresh the context after loading all resources, this means that no more resources can be added to the returned context.

        Parameters:
        errorOnMissingResource - Whether to throw an exception on missing resource names
        resourceNames - Resource names to load
        Returns:

      • loadApplicationContextFromFiles

        public static final org.springframework.context.support.GenericApplicationContext loadApplicationContextFromFiles(boolean errorOnMissingResource,
                                                                                                                  String... fileNames)

        Load a Spring GenericApplicationContext from the given file names.

        This method will refresh the context after loading all resources, this means that no more resources can be added to the returned context.

        Parameters:
        fileNames -
        Returns:
